abstract: Nate Chinen Critic's Notebook commends Jeff Tweedy and his band Wilco for Solid Sound Festival, family-friendly, artistically rich four-year-old music event organized by the alternative-rock band as way to show fans their latest reinvention and introduce other innovative musicians.
lead_paragraph: The Solid Sound Festival in North Adams, Mass., is determinedly upbeat, inclusive and family-friendly, and it features a convergence of grown-up indie tastes.

headline.main: Wilco Tinkers and Experiments at a Festival It’s Happy to Share
headline.print_headline: Wilco Tinkers and Experiments at a Festival It’s Happy to Share

snippet: The Solid Sound Festival in North Adams, Mass., is determinedly upbeat, inclusive and family-friendly, and it features a convergence of grown-up indie tastes.
